text: cng rảlụk t̄hụng k̄hṇa thī̀ ma lā xik aḥ̒ kl̀āw ẁā mạryạm xěy! Thæ̂ cring xạllxḥ̒ thrng cæ̂ng k̄h̀āwdī kæ̀ ṭhex sụ̀ng phcmān h̄nụ̀ng cāk phraxngkh̒ chụ̄̀x k̄hxng k̄heā khụ̄x xạl ma sīh̄̒ xī sā butr k̄hx ngmạryạm doythī̀ k̄heā ca pĕn p̄hū̂ mī keīyrti nı lok nī̂ læa prlok læa ca xyū̀ nı h̄mū̀ p̄hū̂ kıl̂ chid
